description: Absolute values between digits of n (version 2).
comments: Let the decimal expansion of n be abcd...efg, say. Then a(n) has decimal expansion |a-b| |b-c| |c-d| ... |e-f| |f-g|. Leading zeros in a(n) are omitted.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=10..10000
author: _Felice Russo_
extensions: Definition clarified by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 19 2008.
